General.Name: Menderes Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Menderes Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi operates a cotton and synthetic textile company in Turkey. The company manufactures pressed cotton, yarn, raw cloth, lining, interlining, duvet cover, bed sheet, shirting, and upholstery cloth products. It also engages in the production of electric energy. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

0.Name: Mr. Ali  Atlamaz
0.Title: Chairman of the Exec. Board, Gen. Mang. and Director
